DOC.brief_summary: The purpose evaluate effectiveness physiotherapy program chronic low back pain . We 'll randomize 35 patient two group . Both group receive 8 physioterapy intervention 4 week , particular first group ( study ) receive 4 Fascial Manipulation treatment combine 4 session standard approach ( mobilization stretch exercise ) ; whereas second ( control ) receive standard approach .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Fascial Manipulation Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: All patient assess randomised physician . The control group intervention concern : relaxation lumbar respiration muscle , stretch posterior muscular chain hip flexor , assisted/active mobilization lumbar region sagittal plane rotation , exercise improve proprioception lumbar spine , active progressive movement lumbar spine anterior flexion , extension , lateroflexion rotation , active exercise lumbar stabilizer muscle , occupational training activity daily living , indication recommendation correct posture . The study group intervention receive 4 manual intervention deep fascial tissue , accord fascial manipulation tecnique , provide specific motor manual assessment , deep manual intervention specific fascial alteration .
DOC.criteria: patient chronic low back pain ( 7 week ) age 20 60 year old presence neurological red flag continuative assumption drug low back pain positive imaging spine lesion ( fracture , spondilolistesi , vascular desease ( aneurism abdominal aorta ) secondary lesion ( oncological desease ) rheumatic systemic desease neurological desease could compromise partecipation program exercise
